tool.name: Plot coverage
tool.description: as area plot between BAM files
tool.command: #import re plot_coverage #for $r in $input_files #set identifier = re.sub('[^\w\-_\.\,]', '_', str( $r.input.element_identifier)) --file '$r.input' '$identifier' $r.total_reads #end for output.pdf --cores \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4} --regions '$regions'

repeat.name: input_files
repeat.title: Add input files to coverage plot

param.name: input
param.label: Select a BAM file to plot

param.name: total_reads
param.label: Total number of (mapped) reads. If given plot scale will be reads per million

param.name: regions
param.label: Select regions to plot
param.help: e.g X:1200000-1250000,X1250000-1300000. If left blank will plot all contigs/chromosomes.

tool.help: This tool plots the coverage over a specified region (by default all chromosomes/contigs).
